channel.title: Compiling problem
channel.description:
when i compile i get this error
Compiling..... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M ain Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit. Compiling Finished. Press any key to continue . . .
i looked through all compiler questions go here section and at least 4 other people had this problem and no one is helpfull in that section most people just post "yeah i have that problem too" so can anyone hellp me

thank you ill tell you if this works

item.title: Compiling problem
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Try setting your environment variables. There is a tutorial on this in the tutorial section. I had this problem and doing this fixed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiling problem

item.description:
@peoplereaper2 wrote:

when i compile i get this error

Compiling…
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/sun/tools/javac/M
ain
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.sun.tools.javac.Main
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: com.sun.tools.javac.Main. Program will exit.
Compiling Finished.
Press any key to continue . . .

i looked through all compiler questions go here section and at least 4 other people had this problem and no one is helpfull in that section most people just post “yeah i have that problem too” so can anyone hellp me
